Issues.description: General issues encountered during initialization of the instrument
Issues.solutions: 1. Check COM port connection, and the 4 way valve dial is set to 0, and syringe pump dial is set to 1
Issues.issue: Random keypress during instrument imaging, or after firs booting into Windows 10
Issues.solutions: Unplug Temp and Humitidy USB sensor (ADD PART NUMBER)
Issues.issue: RGBLaser system error message on launching AutoFAT
Issues.solutions: Check all the USB cable is connected to motherboard
Unplug Temp and Humitidy USB sensor, might be malfunctioned (ADD PART NUMBER)
Issues.description: General issues encountered during BEC Insertion
Issues.solutions: Wipe the MEZZ PCBA pogo pins, and BEC PCB pin grid with tissue
Check MEZZ PCBA pogo pins, some might be stuck
Make sure the BEC is primed, and the protective red cap is removed from HV socket (ADD PART NUMBER)
For Piezo FAT test, ensure Air-leak test is passed
Issues.description: General issues encountered during running of the Bolus Delivery Test
